CHAT.comment: STATE OF ALABAMA, Petitioner, v. MICHAEL HERMAN BOZEMAN.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:07 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SANDRA JEAN STEWART ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY A. LAMKEN ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MARK JOHN CHRISTENSEN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF SANDRA JEAN STEWART ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:03 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
